amendment.description: Amendment deletes provisions in the bill which would authorize States to use for non-welfare purposes Federal welfare funds that accumulate in State emergency account funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike provisions of the bill which would authorize states to use for non-welfare purposes federal welfare monies that accumulate in state "rainy day" funds established by the measure.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kleczka amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
